cards.name: Trickstar
cards.skill: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.

cards.name: Vairina
cards.skill:
[overDress]-"Trickstar" (You may place it by stacking it on the specified unit instead of normal calling it to (RC)).
[AUTO](RC):When this unit in the [overDress] state attacks a vanguard, this unit gets [Power]+10000 until end of that battle. Then, COST [Soul Blast (2)], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

cards.name: Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana
cards.skill:
[ACT](VC)1/Turn:COST [Discard a card from your hand], choose a grade 0 card from your drop, and call it to (RC).
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, COST [Counter Blast (1)], and this unit and all of your units with the [overDress] ability get [Power]+10000 until end of turn.

cards.name: Blaze Maiden, Rino
cards.skill:
[AUTO]:When "Blaze Maiden, Reiyu" rides this unit, search your deck for up to one "Trickstar", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power]+2000.

cards.name: Escort Stealth Dragon, Hayashi Kaze
cards.skill:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]: Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO]:When this unit is put into your (GC), COST [discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.

cards.name: Diabolos, "Violence" Bruce
cards.skill:
[AUTO](VC):At the start of your Ride Phase, you "Final Rush". (Specific units get a power up when you are in "Final Rush"!)
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if you are in "Final Rush", COST [Soul Blast (5)], and [Stand] all of your front row rear-guards.

cards.name: Diabolos, "Anger" Richard
cards.skill:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), COST [put a rear-guard into your soul], and draw a card.
[CONT](RC):If you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power]+5000.

cards.name: Diabolos, "Bad" Steve
cards.skill:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose a card from your soul, call it to your back row center (RC), and Soul Charge (1).
[CONT](RC):If you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power]+5000.

cards.name: Brothers' Soul
cards.skill: Soul Charge (2).

cards.name: Fire Slash Dragon, Inferno Sword
cards.skill: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power]+2000.

cards.name: Acrobat Presenter
cards.skill: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, if your vanguard is "Diabolos, "Violence" Bruce", Soul Charge (1), and if you are in "Final Rush", Soul Charge (1).

cards.name: Blaze Maiden, Reiyu
cards.skill:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana", COST [Soul Blast (1)], search your deck for up to one "Vairina", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power]+2000.

cards.name: Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria
cards.skill:
(You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)
Additional Effect-Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+100 Million until end of turn!

cards.name: Dragon Deity King of Resurgence, Dragveda
cards.skill:
(You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)
Additional Effect-Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power]+100 Million until end of turn!

cards.name: Apex Ruler, Bastion
cards.skill:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your grade 3 units get [Power]+2000.
[AUTO](VC)1/Turn:At the end of the battle that your drive check revealed a grade 3, COST [discard a card from your hand], choose one of your rear-guards, [Stand] it, and it gets [Power]+10000 until end of turn.

cards.name: Knight of Heavenly Spear, Rooks
cards.skill:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Apex Ruler, Bastion", COST[reveal three grade 3 cards from your hand], and draw a card.
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have three or more grade 3 units, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power]+5000.

cards.name: Knight of Heavenly Sword, Fort
cards.skill:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Knight of Heavenly Spear, Rooks", COST [reveal two grade 3 cards from your hand], reveal the top card of your deck, call it to (RC) if it is a unit card, and put it into your drop if it isn't.
[ACT](RC)1/Turn:COST [Counter Blast (1)], choose one of your grade 3 vanguards, and it gets [Power]+5000 until end of turn.

cards.name: Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia
cards.skill: [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, COST [Counter Blast (1)], choose one of your rear-guards, and until end of turn, that unit can attack from the back row, and gets [Power]+5000. If you persona rode this turn, choose three rear-guards instead of one.

cards.name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lattice
cards.skill:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia", COST [Soul Blast (1)], reveal the top card of your deck, if it is a unit card, call it to (RC), and if it isn't, put it into your hand.
[AUTO](Back Row RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, COST [Soul Blast (1)], and this unit gets [Power]+10000 until end of that battle.

cards.name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lattice
cards.skill:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Sylvan Horned Beast, Lattice", you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a grade 2 or less unit card, call it to (RC), and if it isn't, put it into your soul.
[CONT](Back Row RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power]+5000.

cards.name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Dooger
cards.skill: [CONT](RC):If you have four or more other rear-guards, this unit gets [Power]+5000.

cards.name: Time-fissuring Fist Colossus
cards.skill: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), Soul Charge (1). Then, if you are in "Final Rush", COST [Counter Blast (1)], and this unit gets [Power]+15000 until end of turn.
